definitions.definition: Alternative form of hackle ( “ tool for separating flax ” ) .
The long shining feathers on a cock's neck.
A feather ornament in the full-dress bonnets of Highland regiments .
An rude interruption during a show, especially a comedy performance
examples: The stand-up dealt well with the heckles from the crowd, replying with raucous banter to raise plenty of laughs.

main_definition: Alternative form of hackle ( “ tool for separating flax ” ) .
